mapper.sql: id, customer_id, receiver_staff_id, start_time, end_time, order_id, present_order_id, present_name, create_date
mapper.select:
select c.id as customer_id, c.`name` as customer_name, (select e.`name` from employee_info e where e.id = r.phone_staff_id) as phone_staff_name, (select e.`name` from employee_info e where e.id = r.receiver_staff_id) as receiver_staff_name, c.type as type, date_format(r.start_time, '%H:%i') as start_time, date_format(r.end_time, '%H:%i') as end_time, date_format(r.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as create_date from reception_info r left join customer_info c on r.customer_id = c.id
order by ${orderByClause}
select count(*) from reception_info r left join customer_info c on r.customer_id = c.id

select c.id as customer_id, c.`name` as customer_name, (select e.`name` from employee_info e where e.id = r.phone_staff_id) as phone_staff_name, (select e.`name` from employee_info e where e.id = r.receiver_staff_id) as receiver_staff_name, c.type as type, date_format(r.start_time, '%H:%i') as start_time, date_format(r.end_time, '%H:%i') as end_time, date_format(r.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as create_date from reception_info r left join customer_info c on r.customer_id = c.id where customer_id =#{condition.customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by r.create_date desc limit 0,5

distinct
